name: whatsapp-flows
description: Expert guidance for authoring WhatsApp Business Account Flows with comprehensive progressive reference documentation and validation tools
author: Anthropic

validation.name: validate_flow.py
validation.description: Main Flow JSON validator - checks structure, required properties, component limits, routing consistency

validation.name: validate_components.py
validation.description: Component-specific validator - validates individual component constraints and properties

examples.name: 01-simple-form.json
examples.description: Multi-screen survey form with name collection, rating selection, and feedback textarea

examples.name: 02-conditional-flow.json
examples.description: Age verification with conditional branching - eligible vs ineligible paths with parental consent

examples.name: 03-product-selection.json
examples.description: E-commerce product selection with dynamic product list from server data

features: 20 comprehensive reference documents organized in 12 progressive tiers
Components: Text, Input, Selection, Date, Media, Rich Content, Navigation
Advanced features: Conditional logic, Nested expressions, Global referencing, Actions
Server integration: Routing models, Data endpoints, Dynamic data binding
Validation tools: Flow JSON validator, Component-specific validator
Best practices and design patterns included
Character limits, component constraints, validation rules
Security guidance for sensitive data handling
3 complete example flows demonstrating different patterns

learning_outcomes: Understand Flow JSON structure and core concepts
Integrate with backend servers and data endpoints
Use advanced features: expressions, global references, dynamic data
